appsgate.lig.context.history
Class ContextHistory

java.lang.Object
  appsgate.lig.context.history.ContextHistory
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataBasePullService, DataBasePushService
public class ContextHistory
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataBasePullService, DataBasePushService

The context history is use to all every context component to save its state. It offer services to save the current state and to get the last state save to/from a mongo data base

Since:
June 16, 2013
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cédric Gérard
See Also:
DataBasePullService, DataBasePushService

Description copied from interface: DataBasePushService
Push the last state of an object name "name". The state is represent by a set of properties and an header represent the last addition of this object. This method specify the user that trigger the update.

Specified by:
pushData_add in interface DataBasePushService
Parameters:
name - the object to push
userID - the user who make the modification
objectID - the core object concern by the modification
addedValue - the added value
properties - the complete object state
Returns:
true if the save is done correctly false otherwise
